EditTextPreference.android:title: Sandbox server host subdomain
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Dev server to use for facebook.com communication, empty for production server. Changes require an app restart.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Use FBLite mode
SwitchPreference.android:summary: Toggles between FBLite mode and FB4a mode in react native feed. Requires app restart.
